segments.text: Peeking into this indoor kitchen, I see the angled view of the walls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink on the right is the main issue here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, no plug, water just keeps coming and overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddleâ€”how hasn't she felt that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the left is risking it all for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, plate as backup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches, arm extended in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief could end badly with a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the tied-back curtains frame a peaceful yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The normalcy outside makes the inside hazards even more jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR
